title: Bug 37021 - Source path incorrect in declare warning on binary files
description: Bug 37021 - Source path incorrect in declare warning on binary files [java|aj]. Tests in 'tests/new/binaryWarnings/' folder can be used to reproduce the issue. Note that these tests may generate false positives due to the filename checking limitations in the harness verification of messages. When the issue occurs, AJDT omits the filename if it does not make sense to AJDT.
OB: The source path in declare warning messages for targeting .class files from injars is displayed as 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main'.
EB: In declare warning messages when targeting .class files from injars, the source path should be displayed as 'app/Main' instead of 'app.Main.class'.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Navigate to the 'tests/new/binaryWarnings/' folder.
2. Run the code in this folder to generate declare warning messages on binary files.
3. Observe that the source path in the declare warning messages is displayed incorrectly as 'app.Main.class'.
